name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3D新衣装お披露目!! 兎田ぺこら生誕祭ライブ♪【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [jgoJuJiWtf4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Pekora continues her high-energy performance of 'Synchrogazer'.
Short transition with the 'Birthday Live' logo on screen.
MC segment where Pekora interacts with the audience and reveals her new 2023 birthday merchandise.

subtitles.original: 何かが動き出す
subtitles.english: Something starts to move

subtitles.original: 僕ら...
subtitles.english: We...

subtitles.original: きっと生まれた日から
subtitles.english: must have been looking for

subtitles.original: 出会えるポーズを ずっと探してたんだ
subtitles.english: the pose to meet ever since the day we were born

subtitles.original: 風の鳴く夜は思い出して
subtitles.english: On nights when the wind cries, remember

subtitles.original: 共に...
subtitles.english: and together...

subtitles.original: 奏でた奇跡...
subtitles.english: ...we played a miracle...

subtitles.original: 天に舞うよ
subtitles.english: ...that dances in the sky

subtitles.original: 僕らの思いは届いていますか？
subtitles.english: Are our feelings reaching you?

subtitles.original: True or Bye
subtitles.english: True or Bye

subtitles.original: 胸を打つ度 もどかしさが募る
subtitles.english: Every time my heart beats, frustration grows

subtitles.original: Fly or Bye
subtitles.english: Fly or Bye

subtitles.original: いつも避けてばかりだ
subtitles.english: I'm always just avoiding things,

subtitles.original: 明日を見失いそうで
subtitles.english: as if I'm about to lose sight of tomorrow

subtitles.original: 傷つけないように
subtitles.english: So as not to hurt anyone,

subtitles.original: 傷つかないように
subtitles.english: so as not to get hurt...

subtitles.original: 嘘だけが増えていく
subtitles.english: ...only lies keep increasing

subtitles.original: 適当に笑っていたいくらいに
subtitles.english: So much that I want to just laugh it off,

subtitles.original: 苦しいほどに そう愛おしいから
subtitles.english: it's so painful because it's so dear

subtitles.original: 求める気持ち 抑えきれない
subtitles.english: I was afraid of myself, unable to suppress

subtitles.original: 自分が怖かった
subtitles.english: my desires

subtitles.original: やっと 体中巡る
subtitles.english: At last, I've noticed the rhythm of instinct

subtitles.original: 本能のリズムに 気付いたんだ
subtitles.english: coursing through my body

subtitles.original: もう二度と君を離さないよ
subtitles.english: I'll never let you go again

subtitles.original: いつもの昨日より...
subtitles.english: More than the usual yesterday...

subtitles.original: 未来を照らす
subtitles.english: ...I'll light up the future

subtitles.original: この身 朽ち果てても
subtitles.english: Even if this body decays completely

subtitles.original: 伝えたいものがある
subtitles.english: there's something I want to convey

subtitles.original: 響け 命の歌
subtitles.english: Resonate, song of life

subtitles.original: 彼方 羽ばたいて
subtitles.english: Flapping wings to the distance

subtitles.original: だから笑って
subtitles.english: So smile,

subtitles.original: 誰よりも熱く 誰よりも強く 抱きしめたい
subtitles.english: I want to embrace you hotter than anyone, stronger than anyone

subtitles.original: 震える心 揺さぶればいい
subtitles.english: It's okay to shake your trembling heart

subtitles.original: 何かが動き出す
subtitles.english: Something starts to move

subtitles.original: 僕ら...
subtitles.english: We...

subtitles.original: きっと生まれた日から
subtitles.english: must have been looking for

subtitles.original: 出会えるポーズを ずっと探してたんだ
subtitles.english: the pose to meet ever since the day we were born

subtitles.original: 風の鳴く夜は思い出して
subtitles.english: On nights when the wind cries, remember

subtitles.original: 共に...
subtitles.english: and together...

subtitles.original: 紡ぎ出した奇跡...
subtitles.english: ...the miracle we spun out...

subtitles.original: 天を描くよ
subtitles.english: ...will draw the heavens

subtitles.original: みんな、みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, everyone!

subtitles.original: どうぺこだった？可愛かった？
subtitles.english: How was it-peko? Was I cute?

subtitles.original: そんな君にお知らせだ！それはこちら！ドゥルン！
subtitles.english: I have an announcement for you! It's this! *Drumroll*

subtitles.original: 兎田ぺこら誕生日記念2023のグッズ発売！
subtitles.english: Usada Pekora Birthday Celebration 2023

subtitles.original: イエイイエイイエイ！
subtitles.english: goods are now on sale! Yay yay yay!

subtitles.original: ということで商品は、こちら！
subtitles.english: And so, here are the products!

subtitles.original: ドゥルン、こっちだった。あははは。
subtitles.english: *Drumroll*, it was this way. Hahaha.

subtitles.original: はぐれ先生の描き下ろしの等身大タペストリーと、
subtitles.english: A life-sized tapestry illustrated by Hagure-sensei, and

subtitles.original: 今年は、何年ぺこですか？
subtitles.english: What year is it this year-peko?

subtitles.original: さぁ、卯年！ということで、
subtitles.english: That's right, the Year of the Rabbit! And so,

subtitles.original: 絵馬とお守り！
subtitles.english: an ema and an amulet!

subtitles.original: しかもこのお守りは、超幸運お守りぺこだから、
subtitles.english: And this amulet is a Super Good Luck Amulet-peko,

subtitles.original: これを持ってたら確実…いや、個人差ありますぺこですけども、
subtitles.english: so if you have this, you'll definitely... well, there are individual differences-peko,

subtitles.original: きっと運がいい間違いなし！
subtitles.english: but you'll surely have good luck!

subtitles.original: そして野うさぎのティッシュカバー！
subtitles.english: And the Nousagi tissue cover!

subtitles.original: こちらが、えーぺこちゃんの誕生日記念グッズとなっております。
subtitles.english: These are Peko-chan's birthday celebration goods.

subtitles.original: どうぺこですか？可愛くないぺこですか？
subtitles.english: How are they-peko? Aren't they cute-peko?

subtitles.original: 等身大タペストリーと絵馬はね、はぐれママの描き下ろしなので是非是非！
subtitles.english: The life-sized tapestry and ema are illustrated by Hagure-mama, so definitely get them!

subtitles.original: そして、ぺこらの一押しはやっぱ、幸運お守りかなーって思っております。
subtitles.english: And, Pekora's top recommendation is the good luck amulet.

subtitles.original: みんながね、卯年をね、あのー幸せに暮らせるように、
subtitles.english: I hope everyone can live happily during the Year of the Rabbit,

subtitles.original: このお守りをね、いつも肌身離さず持っていたら、
subtitles.english: so if you keep this amulet with you at all times,

subtitles.original: きっといいことが絶対に起きるぺこだから、是非要チェック！
subtitles.english: something good will definitely happen-peko, so please check it out!

subtitles.original: あとティッシュカバーもね、あの寒い時期とかに鼻かんでよろぺこです！
subtitles.english: Also, the tissue cover too, please use it to blow your nose during the cold season!

subtitles.original: そしてこちらね、あのフルセットで買っていただいた方には、
subtitles.english: And for those who buy the full set,

subtitles.original: 兎田ぺこら箔押し複製サイン＆メッセージ入りのポストカード！
subtitles.english: you'll get a postcard with Usada Pekora's foil-stamped signature and message!
